content: such a perfectly sweet baby dress suitable for family photos and special occasions the set-in sleeves have a beautifully executed gather at the top for a little bit of poof the skirting of the dress features tiny little bobbles throughout it inlcudes the perfect understated accessory with a little bow in front all this in an easy-to-read pattern with easy stitches you ll have a beautiful garment which will rival even the large department store chains sizes are 6 months 9 months 12 months 18 months and 24 months >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version
